name: expressiveOS
short_description: A Linux distribution developed by relatively small team, bored with anty-open source superstitions. We just want to prove people that working with this software may be even more comfortable than with commercial software. The user's comfort is more important than our: we provide graphical wizards for many operations such as software installation.
summary: expressiveOS - The system from people for people
